org.devgateway.ocds.persistence.mongo.excel

Class OCDSObjectExcelSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.devgateway.ocds.persistence.mongo.excel.AbstractExcelSheet
      • org.devgateway.ocds.persistence.mongo.excel.OCDSObjectExcelSheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExcelSheet

    public final class OCDSObjectExcelSheet
extends AbstractExcelSheet
    Implementation of a ExcelSheet interface for an OCDS Object. An OCDS Object can pe exported in several ways: * in a separate sheet ExcelExportSepareteSheet * in an existing sheet on a particular row (the object it's part of a main release phases) * in an existing row, but exported as a flatten object writeRowFlattenObject(java.util.List<java.lang.Object>, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row)
    Since:
    6/7/16

      • writeRowFlattenObject

        public void writeRowFlattenObject(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> objects,
                                  org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row row)
        Function to flat export an array of objects. Example: [ { x: aaa, y: bbb, }, { x: ccc, y: ddd, } ] Will be printed as: | x | y | | aaa ; bbb | ccc ; ddd |
        Parameters:
        objects -
        row -

      • writeSheetGetLink
